version_description:
1. add auto connection
2. add language settings
3. fix some bugs

1. add "custom mode" into "my dashboard"
2. fix some bugs

2. add HUD display in "my dashboard"
3. fix some potential bugs
add language of Turkish

1. add Opel KWP 10400 Mode
2. fix some bugs
fix some bugs

1. Modify the function of fault code query.
2. Shield the bluetooth 4.0.
3. Modify some bugs
fix bluetooth 4.0
更新一些蓝牙连接不上的问题

1. Revised the DTC errors in the page of diagnosis.
2. Revised some data cannot display when enter My Dashboard at the second time.

1.Fix the problem of supporting landscape display
2.Fix the problem of mess when rotating the screen
Support IOS9.0 system
Add MI mode, supporting the CHEMI box
Add MI mode, supporting the CHEMI box
Add MI mode, supporting the CHEMI box
Add MI mode, supporting the CHEMI box
Fixed a bug
Optimize the compatibility of the car the iOBD2 mini box. To improve the stability of the software.

1. Fixed the problem of ELM327 hardware without WI-FI connection.
2. Fixed the problem of existing Chinese and verbal errors in English environment.
3. Fixed the problem of failing to access function interface via guide page on iPhone4.
4. Fixed the problem of Bluetooth searching flash back in iOS7 and earlier.
5. Added the function of manually updating the firmware.
6. Fully optimized iOBD2 pro related functions.
Add a kind of hardware support

1. Adds trip record function for iOBD2 JAPAN mode .
2. Add 0.66 L displacement vehicle choice .
3. Added a performance chart recording function for IOBD2 JAPAN mode 。
Modify the function of some unnecessary
